title: ViewportRecorder
description: This plugin offers a range of nodes to capture the viewport. Record gameplay, take screenshots with and without UI and take high resolution screenshot all from inside the engine.
longDescription:
Video showcase: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XIVdiVHJ0as&feature=youtu.be

Example Project: https://drive.google.com/open?id=17ZhtzzrY0_uBGxjmllIYLmGJ8AYrOe4v

Documentation: www.samuelmetters.co.uk/viewportrecorder

Support: https://forums.unrealengine.com/unreal-engine/marketplace/1644502-viewport-recorder


ViewportRecorder offers various ways for developers and player to capture images and videos from within the game (no need for external screen capture software). It was made ready to be implemented in Blueprints and works in editor (PIE and Standalone) but also in shipped builds. The maximum recording resolution is currently 1920x1080 at 60fps. Regarding screenshots and high resolution renders, they are saved as PNGs.


The plugin’s content includes a template pawn with the correct and commented implementation of the features. It can be implemented in pretty much any Blueprint class that you have (not limited to pawns).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Record videos: Capture in-game footage up to 1080p 60fps.
  • Video format: Encoded with DVIX in a .avi file.
  • Set recording resolution: Change the recording resolution from Blueprints.
  • Capture screenshots: Save screenshots with or without the UI to the specified path.
  • Capture HighResShot: Render HighResShots to the specified path.
  • Explore window: Uses window’s default SaveFileDialog.

Code Modules: ViewportRecorder (Runtime)

Number of Blueprints: 3

Number of C++ Classes: 5

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64

Documentation: www.samuelmetters.co.uk/viewportrecorder

Example Project: https://drive.google.com/open?id=17ZhtzzrY0_uBGxjmllIYLmGJ8AYrOe4v


Important Notes: Performance will vary depending on the computer the build is running on. Multi-threading can be enabled to maximize performance without affecting the game’s frame rate but might make the editor unstable. See documentation for performance reports or try out the demo build.

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
Fix an issue where the keyboard controls wouldn't register properly.

Make sure to input a file name when using the save file dialog window.

Make sure to input a file name when using the save file dialog window.
